forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 8 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
As the night sighs its last and the dawn teeters on the edge of possibility, San Francisco awakens under a quilt of clouds. The air is cool, hovering at a tranquil 54, with a gentle west-southwest wind weaving its way through the streets. The early hours whisper of a day that promises to yield more light, as patches of sun attempt to escape their cloudy shroud. 

By midday, expect the city to embrace a canvas painted with mostly sun-kissed skies, illuminating the iconic landmarks—from the Golden Gate to the bustling cafes downtown. The temperature, comfortably mild, will rise to about 66, then settle into a cool evening breeze. Yet, the winds will show their lively side, rustling through the trees at speeds up to 21 mph, with playful gusts reaching 25. The marine layer may linger near the coast, draping the hills in a delicate fog, but this should give way to clearer vistas as the hours pass. Dress in layers that reflect the changing moods of the day; a light jacket will serve you well in the morning chill, while a simpler outfit in warmer materials will suit the afternoon warmth.

This day invites you to step outside and savor the mildness. Stroll through the quiet streets or perhaps find a seat at a local café, where the aroma of freshly brewed coffee floats through the air, mingling with the sounds of laughter and chatter. Such serenity is perfect for a leisurely read in the park or a visit to the myriad boutiques tucked away from the hustle. Whether you find solace in solitude or pleasure in company, this day holds the promise of quiet delights against the backdrop of a vibrant city awakening.
